name: tslint-pareto-rules
description: tslint rules to enforce the pareto style of coding

scripts.pubMin: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && rd /s /q .\dist && tsc && npm run lint && npm run test && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && rd /s /q .\dist && tsc && npm run lint && npm run test && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.u2l: echo 'don't update to latest, A specific version of typescript is needed for tslint'

author: corno
